metadata.title: CVE-2021-23358 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The package underscore from 1.13.0-0 and before 1.13.0-2, from 1.3.2 andbefore 1.12.1 are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Injection via the templatefunction, particularly when a variable property is passed as an argument asit is not sanitized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23358` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-underscore - 1.8.3~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
node-underscore - 1.8.3~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: underscore package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.3~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1').
